title: DecisionEvent
description: The  DecisionEvent XDM is used to capture observations that in the course of decisioning. The DecisionEvent captures information about the decision taking place and when it is occurring.

@id.title: Identifier
@id.description: The unique identifier for the DecisionEvent.

xdm:timestamp.title: Timestamp
xdm:timestamp.description: The time when the first event of the decision occurred.

xdm:endUserIDs.title: End User IDs
xdm:endUserIDs.description: Condensed, normalized encapsulation of all end user identifiers.

xdm:propositions.title: Propopostion Details
xdm:propositions.description: Details about the individual context variables and outcomes for the decision.

xdm:batchId.title: Batch ID
xdm:batchId.description: An ID associated with the decision event, used to manipulate together independent events which occurred in the same batch.

xdm:containerId.title: Container ID
xdm:containerId.description: An ID associated with library of business objects.
